channel.title: CVE Feed for ZTE -- ZXIPTV-EPG
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ZTE -- ZXIPTV-EPG

item.title: CVE-2017-10934|2024-08-05T17:50:12.786Z -- zte -- zxiptv-epg
item.description: All versions prior to V5.09.02.02T4 of the ZTE ZXIPTV-EPG product use the Java RMI service in which the servers use the Apache Commons Collections (ACC) library that may result in Java deserialization vulnerabilities. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit the vulnerabilities by sending a crafted RMI request to execute arbitrary code on the target host.
